name: Little Pieces of My House
description:
this game is best played with as little light or sound as possible, in full full full screen.

This game was made at 3 am - 4 am, using Flatgame, on my phone. I went around my house and turned lights on in rooms one at a time and took photos from outside those rooms. My phone is very old and it's camera can barely pick up any light, which can sometimes result in photos I think are very interesting

alternate version of the music here.
